item.title: 英国央行首席经济学家质疑量化宽松是应对危机的 "大锤
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）对过去危机中量化宽松政策被用作 "大锤 "的方式提出了质疑，一天前，他的一位同事说央行今后应采取更有针对性和更有分寸的方法。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill has raised doubts over the way quantitative easing was used as a “sledgehammer” during past crises, a day after one of his colleagues said the central bank should take a more targeted and measured approach in future.】

item.title: 美国银行在市场动荡中渡过难关得益于它们反对的资本建设
item.description: 在上一轮动荡过去仅仅两年之后，美国的大型银行正处于波涛汹涌的环境中，而这一次，几乎没有人质疑银行业是否有能力渡过即将到来的任何难关。这是因为有充足的资本；具有讽刺意味的是，这是因为银行家们大多反对建立财务缓冲。【原文：Big US banks are navigating a choppy environment just two years after the last round of turmoil, this time with almost no one questioning the industry’s ability to ride out whatever is coming. That’s because there’s plenty of capital — ironically due to a buildup of financial buffers that bankers mostly opposed.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，印度央行认为有理由在关税不确定的情况下放宽政策
item.description: 印度央行周三的货币政策会议纪要显示，印度决策者希望放宽借贷成本，以保护国内需求免受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的高关税可能引发的经济放缓的影响。【原文：India’s policymakers wanted to ease borrowing costs to shield domestic demand from a possible slowdown triggered by US President Donald Trump’s high tariffs, minutes of the central bank’s monetary policy meeting showed Wednesday.】

item.title: 大功率太阳能电池有望取代电池
item.description:
联想正在使用初创公司 Ambient Photonics 的技术来淘汰键盘中的电池。【原文：

Lenovo is using startup Ambient Photonics’s technology to get rid of batteries in a keyboard.

】

item.title: 特斯拉在经历 2021 年以来最艰难的一个季度后缩减支出计划
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc. pared its outlook for capital expenditures this year, cautioning that changes in trade policies may set back its timelines for unspecified projects.】

item.title: 任天堂称日本市场对 Switch 2 控制台需求旺盛
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）表示，其即将推出的游戏机Switch 2在日本市场的需求量非常大，这表明这款小工具有望成为视频游戏行业历史上最大规模的硬件发布。【原文：Nintendo Co. said it is seeing overwhelming demand for its upcoming game console Switch 2 in Japan, in a sign the gadget could be on track for the biggest hardware launch in the video game industry’s history.】

item.title: 纳格尔称，对美国国债避险地位的怀疑对世界不利
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，强劲的美国国债市场对所有人都有好处，即使投资者已经转向德国国债。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said a strong US Treasuries market is good for everyone, even as investors have turned to German bunds.】

item.title: 阿根廷比索走强，米莱伊至今未如预期
item.description: 布宜诺斯艾利斯的交易商们开始对哈维尔-米莱总统提出的阿根廷货币升值至 1 美元兑 1000 比索的目标买账，尽管经济学家们警告说，在美元供应趋于枯竭的下半年，这一趋势可能会逆转。【原文：Traders in Buenos Aires are beginning to buy into President Javier Milei’s target of strengthening Argentina’s currency toward 1,000 pesos per dollar, even as economists warn the trend could reverse in the second half of the year when dollar supply tends to dry up.】

item.title: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司积压燃气轮机以应对电力需求激增
item.description: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova Inc.【原文：GE Vernova Inc. said it has increased its backlog of orders for gas turbines as global demand for electricity continues to rise.】

item.title: 纳格尔警告：德国面临关税带来的衰退风险
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，由于美国关税的影响，德国今年有可能出现经济衰退。【原文：Germany is in danger of suffering a recession this year due to the fallout from US tariffs, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 关税重拳出击，中美燃料贸易再起波澜
item.description:
这个亚洲国家开始从其他地方寻找用于制造丙烷和塑料的液化石油气。【原文：

The Asian nation is starting to look elsewhere for the liquefied petroleum gas that makes propane and plastics. 

】

item.title: 阿波罗斥资 2.2 亿美元押注社区太阳能，以满足蓬勃发展的需求
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司将斥资高达 2.2 亿美元与佛蒙特州的一家社区太阳能公司组建合资企业，以帮助满足美国日益增长的电力需求。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is spending as much as $220 million to form a joint venture with a Vermont-based community solar company to help serve the growing US demand for electricity.】

item.title: 空中客车将从沙特阿拉伯采购钛金属作为喷气机交易的一部分
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）计划从沙特阿拉伯采购生产飞机所需的部分金属，这是与沙特国旗航空公司达成的宽体飞机交易的一部分。【原文：Airbus SE plans to source some metal to manufacture its aircraft from Saudi Arabia as part of a widebody aircraft deal with the kingdom’s flag carrier.】

item.title: Alafia AI 将超级计算机放在你的办公桌上
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将介绍计算技术的进步，这些技术可以让您更轻松地在办公桌前使用强大的人工智能工具。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 科技巨头将把囤积的 5000 亿美元现金用于更多回购
item.description: 虽然许多投资者都被今年股市大跌中的科技巨头吓跑了，但这些公司很可能会继续投入资金进行回购，这至少会为这些股票提供一个持续的支撑。【原文：While many investors have been scared away from tech giants at the center of this year’s equity rout, the companies are likely to continue plowing money into buybacks that will offer at least one source of continuing support for the stocks.】

item.title: KKR 退出银行对卡罗私人贷款的包销交易
item.description: KKR 为其收购 Karo Healthcare 签订了直接贷款人协议，从而避免了由其选定的银行为初始贷款提供承保。【原文：KKR signed up direct lenders for its acquisition of Karo Healthcare, steering the deal away from the banks it had picked to underwrite the initial loans.】

item.title: 柬埔寨从中国获得资金，特朗普征收关税
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平领导的中国政府正在柬埔寨推进富南特曲运河项目，这是一个耗资 12 亿美元的基础设施项目，是中国在这个与泰国、老挝和越南接壤的国家进行深度投资的一部分。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping’s government is moving ahead with the Funan Techo Canal in Cambodia, a $1.2 billion infrastructure project that’s part of China’s deep investments in the country bordering Thailand, Laos and Vietnam.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率再次上升，达到二月中旬以来最高点
item.description: 上周，美国抵押贷款利率再次上升，达到 2 月中旬以来的最高水平，进一步抑制了购房或再融资的欲望。【原文：US mortgage rates rose again last week, reaching the highest level since mid-February and further depressing the appetite to buy homes or refinance loans.】

item.title: PayPal 旨在通过提供 3.7% 的余额来促进稳定币的使用
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.）计划为持有其稳定币的用户提供奖励，以鼓励用户在竞争日益激烈的市场中更多地使用这种数字代币。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. plans to offer rewards to its users on their holdings of its stablecoin, in a bid to encourage more usage of the digital token in an increasingly competitive market.】

item.title: Verizon 未达预期，AT&T 移动电话用户数突破预期
item.description: AT&T Inc.第一季度吸引的新无线用户超过了分析师的预期，这证明该公司正在竞争激烈的移动电话市场上吸引竞争对手的客户。【原文：AT&T Inc. attracted more new wireless subscribers than analysts expected in the first quarter, evidence the company is luring customers from rivals in the highly competitive mobile-phone market.】

item.title: 印度市场抵御全球波动，富兰克林脱颖而出
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿公司认为，印度股票和债券的表现将好于同行，这凸显了印度作为关税不确定性避风港的吸引力与日俱增。【原文：Indian stocks and bonds will fare better than peers, according to Franklin Templeton, underscoring the country’s growing appeal as a refuge from tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: Pimco 称国债在经历暴跌后开始变得有吸引力
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策引发抛售之后，太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. is starting to see opportunity in Treasuries after a selloff spurred by concerns over US President Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 新风险投资公司 CIV 募集 2 亿美元，押注制造业和能源行业
item.description: 一家名为 CIV 的新风险投资公司已经筹集了 2 亿美元的首期基金，用于投资处理核能和制造业等项目的初创企业；该公司还加入了硅谷支持具有全国影响的物理世界公司的更广泛运动。【原文：A new venture capital firm called CIV has raised an inaugural fund of $200 million to invest in startups tackling projects like nuclear energy and manufacturing — joining a broader movement in Silicon Valley to back physical-world companies with national implications.】

item.title: 亚马逊 "星链 "的竞争对手努力提高卫星产量
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的太空互联网企业正在努力提高生产量，这危及到该企业能否在政府规定的最后期限内，在明年夏天之前将 1600 多颗卫星送入轨道。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s internet-from-space venture is struggling to ramp up production, jeopardizing its ability to meet a government deadline to have more than 1,600 satellites in orbit by next summer.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 将聘请摩根士丹利参与 Logisteed 股票发行
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.已选择摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为日本物流运营商 Logisteed Ltd. 在东京的潜在股份出售提供帮助。【原文：KKR & Co. has picked Morgan Stanley to help work on a potential share sale of Japanese logistics operator Logisteed Ltd. in Tokyo, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普发出威胁后，苹果和 Meta 遭欧盟 7 亿欧元罚款
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发出严厉报复的警告后，苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. were hit by relatively modest European Union fines totaling €700 million ($798 million) for violating tough new antitrust rules for Big Tech following warnings of harsh retaliation from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 马来西亚部长将就关税问题会见美国贸易部长格里尔
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）将在华盛顿会见美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer），因为这个东南亚国家正在寻求特朗普政府互惠关税的减免。【原文：Malaysia’s Trade Minister Zafrul Aziz will meet US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer in Washington as the Southeast Asian country seeks relief from the Trump administration’s reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 关税冲击标普 500 指数，CEO 愁云惨淡堪比金融危机
item.description: 自金融危机以来，美国企业从未在财报电话会议上对经济状况如此悲观，这对投资者来说是一个不祥之兆，他们正试图弄清唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战会给股市带来多大的痛苦。【原文：Not since the financial crisis has Corporate America been so downbeat about the state of the economy in earnings calls, an ominous sign for investors trying to figure out how much more pain Donald Trump’s trade war will inflict on the stock market.】
